markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thwart Evil](/Feats.aspx?ID=3610) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882)

**Trigger**
A creature you can see uses a spell or ability that has the [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64) or [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) traits.

</column>

---

You react instinctively when you sense evil forming, thrusting your spiritual energy toward the source to snuff out evil before it fully manifests. Attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell or ability using your Religion modifier as your counteract modifier.
name: Thwart Evil
